Headline: #87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 87th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Longwood
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via: 103rd, Longwood, 99th, Western, and 103rd, due to, street blockage, near 103rd/Longwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 103rd, Longwood, 99th, Western, and 103rd, due to, street blockage, near 103rd/Longwood.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
